cast.name: 约翰·特拉沃尔塔 John Travolta
简妮斯·迪金森 Janice Dickinson

introduction: 50 Greatest Plastic Surgery Shockers is a two hour special charting 50 jaw-dropping tales of infamous plastic surgery victims from the gargantuan breasts of Lolo Ferrarri to the grotesquely cat-like features of Jocelyn Wildenstein.The show  includes contributions from victims of the surgeries including Jackie Stallone, Pete Burns, Cindy Jackson, Jodie Marsh, Alicia Douvall and Brian Zembic – who had breast implants for a $100,000 bet – plus expert analysis from some of the world’s leading plastic surgeons, memorable archive moments and exciting morphing graphics. The programme showcases the dramatic transformations in all their gobsmacking glory.
